page.title: 20POLICE FORCE
page.content: ON THE 23-5-85 OUR CLASS 5/J INTERVIEWED{P.C.}NEIL BATEMAN, ONE OF THE TWO POLICEMEN ON FOOT{PATROL}DUTY IN NEWBIGGIN.THIS IS THE RESULT OF OUR INTERVIEW. IS NEWBIGGIN AN EASY PLACE TO WORK IN AS A POLICEMAN? YES.THERE ARE TWO POLICEMEN IN NEWBIGGIN,ONE OF THEM WORKS FROM 8.A.M. TO 4.P.M. THE OTHER POLICEMAN WORKS FROM 4.P.M. TO 12.A.M. THERE ARE 3,500 POLICEMAN IN NORTHUMBERLAND. THERE ARE 146,000 {CRIMES}COMMITED IN NORTHUMBERLAND. WHAT IS THE MOST SERIOUS THING THAT HAS HAPPENED TO YOU IN YOUR JOB? I HAVE BEEN BEATEN UP.DID YOU HAVE TO STUDY HARD? YES I HAD TO PASS 5 O LEVELS.WHAT IS THE MOST INTERESTING AND REWARDING PART OF YOUR JOB?BEING ABLE TO{HELP}PEOPLE.
